title: 1961년 Zaharko 사건

description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: In the Matter of Mary M. Zaharko v. Stephen P. Kennedy, as Police Commissioner of the City of New York
**판결일**: 1961-02-28
**법원**: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York
**관할**: New York, NY

## 인용

- 12 A.D.2d 924

## 판결문 요약


Order entered on or about June 7, 1960, denying petitioner’s application to rescind the action of the Police Commissioner of the City of New York disapproving petitioner’s application for full pay while on sick leave, and dismissing the petition, unanimously affirmed, with $20 costs and disbursements to the respondent. No opinion. Concur—Botein, P. J., Rabin, Valente, McNally and Eager, JJ.
...
